itunes:title: France Press 3 - Paul Pelosi Gets Hammered
title: France Press 3 - Paul Pelosi Gets Hammered
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
description:
Nancy Pelosi's husband Paul was attacked with a hammer by an insane nudist, two pranksters tricked the press into thinking they were fired Twitter data engineers, JonBenet Ramsey's brother was obsessed with poop, and the guys give tips on how to tell your wife's dad that you're gonna do weird stuff with her.
